name: ECLIPSE (itch) (meifel, ib0n, SleepyFeeshy, Zeurille, katescapedsgn, m4trixx)
name_original: ECLIPSE (itch) (meifel, ib0n, SleepyFeeshy, Zeurille, katescapedsgn, m4trixx)
description:
A 2D Celeste-inspired platformer that explores the Brazillian myth of celestial romance. Play as the Sun, and find your way through different terrains to reach the Moon up in the sky before she disappears once again.

Controls:

  • WASD - movement
  • space - jump
  • shift - wall grab
  • alt - dash

Credits:

Programming

  • Patricia Lee (Meifel) 
  • Jonas Supan (Tori)
  • Zachary Michael Romualdez (Zach)

Art

  • Hannah Meg Arcega (Meguri)

UI/UX Design
